Text.Page:
Well, you see... our Head Researcher ordered us to close the fishery.
I'm sorry, but you'll have to take it up with him yourself.
<PCNAME> caught an ancient fish with unusual scales to save the Murcai Fishery.

What brings you here? Fishing?

I'm sorry, but we simply cannot allow people to use the fishery right now. All this activity is seriously disrupting our research.

I'm doing very careful experiments on a rare powder found only in this location. Our original sample is almost gone, and with all this fishing going on, we can't get any more.

It's not personal, it's for the Mysterium."Won't you reconsider?"

I suppose if you could collect the powder for us...

No, I don't know how to do it either. You'll have to figure that out on your own.

Rare powders? It sounds like he's talking about the scales of a Giant Catfish!

It's an almost legendary BAF that can only be caught here, with scales so fine they sparkle like diamonds.

Hey, I've got an idea! If you catch a Giant Catfish, the director will have enough scales for dozens of experiments! What do we have to lose? Let's catch that fish!

This fish's scales are the source of our powder? Fascinating...

With a fish of this size, not only can we continue our experiments, but we'll have a great lunch!

Please let the fishery manager know as long as he can supply us with these scales, the fishery can stay open indefinitely.

Have you completed your task?

We need that powder to continue our experiments.

The fishery is saved!

Thank you so much. Please, take this reward.
